roleset.name: deliver from mortal or immortal danger/destruction

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Lyrycyst shares his salvation from destructive behavior.

example.name: args 0,1
example.text: And they have developed a method and curriculum that jump-starts then juices the efforts of tribal language preservationists in their salvation of the tribal tongues before the fast setting sun sets on them.

roleset.note: SALVATION-N NOTES: Expanded by Julia based on BOLT, salvage.01. Corresponds to VNcls (from salvation.01-n)
